question: Recently, Lok Sabha passed bill to set up National Forensic Sciences University by upgrading which among the following institutions?
option2: Jayaprakash Narayan National Institute of Criminology and Forensic Sciences
explanation: Recently, The National Forensic Sciences University Bill, 2020 was passed in Lok Sabha which establishes the Gujarat Forensic Sciences University, Gandhinagar (established under the Gujarat Forensic Sciences University Act, 2008) and the Lok Nayak Jayaprakash Narayan National Institute of Criminology and Forensic Sciences, New Delhi, as a University called the National Forensic Sciences University at Gujarat.
